snippet: Joseph Cassano, an emergency medical technician, resigned after it was discovered that he posted messages suggesting hatred for Jews, blacks and poor people.
abstract: Joseph Cassano, emergency medical technician with New York City Fire Department, and son of FDNY Commissioner Salvatore J Cassano, resigns after revelations that he posted Twitter messages suggesting hatred for Jews, blacks and poor people; online posts underscore difficulty faced by the department as it seeks to change its culture in the face of criticism over racial inequities in its ranks.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Cassano, an emergency medical technician, resigned after it was discovered that he posted messages suggesting hatred for Jews, blacks and poor people.

headline.seo: Son of Salvatore Cassano Resigns in Wake of Twitter Posts
headline.main: Fire Commissioner’s Son Resigns as Offensive Twitter Posts Surface
